query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Già era l’angel dietro a noi rimaso, 2 l’angel che n’avea vòlti al sesto giro, 3 avendomi dal viso un colpo raso;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 e quei c’hanno a giustizia lor disiro 5 detto n’avea beati, e le sue voci 6 con ‘sitiunt’, sanz’ altro, ciò forniro.
query.error: **English:** 4 and to those who have their desire for justice 5 he had said, “Blessed,” and his words 6 with “they thirst,” without anything else, completed that.
query.result: 4 ha’gas a wra dhe’n jystyns aga dysyr 5 ow leverys “beati”, ha’y levow 6 gans “sitiunt”, heb tra, a wra henna gorfen.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 E io più lieve che per l’altre foci 8 m’andava, sì che sanz’ alcun labore 9 seguiva in sù li spiriti veloci;

query.prompt:

16 mia benvoglienza inverso te fu quale 17 più strinse mai di non vista persona, 18 sì ch’or mi parran corte queste scale.

query.result: 16 ow karanteth dhe’th-ugh o seugh ken, 17 ages na wra gwell dhe’n dhew berson na wra gwelys, 18 byttegyns an gresow-ma ma a wra berr.”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
19 Ma dimmi, e come amico mi perdona 20 se troppa sicurtà m’allarga il freno, 21 e come amico omai meco ragiona:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
22 come poté trovar dentro al tuo seno 23 loco avarizia, tra cotanto senno 24 di quanto per tua cura fosti pieno?».
query.error: **English:** 22 how could avarice find a place within your breast, 23 among so much wisdom, 24 of which through your care you were full?
query.result: 22 pyth a alla bosavledya yn-dann dhe’th kolon 23 le a-ves kemmys sens, 24 a’th o seugh kemmys sens o seugh plen?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
25 Queste parole Stazio mover fenno 26 un poco a riso pria; poscia rispuose: 27 «Ogne tuo dir d’amor m’è caro cenno.
query.error: **English:** 25 These words made Statius move 26 a little to laughter first; then he replied: 27 “Every word of yours is a dear sign of love to me.
query.result: 25 An gerow-ma a wrug Statyus movia 26 bythyn dhe risya kyns; wosa henna leverys: 27 “Pub tra gerow a’th yw kar cen a garanteth.”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
28 Veramente più volte appaion cose 29 che danno a dubitar falsa matera 30 per le vere ragion che son nascose.
query.error: **English:** 28 Truly many times things appear 29 that give false matter for doubt 30 because of the true reasons that are hidden.
query.result: 28 Yn-gwir, liesow troha a wra gwesys traow 29 a wra gwra mater fals dhe ammres 30 rag an gwir resonow a yw kudhys.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
31 La tua dimanda tuo creder m’avvera 32 esser ch’i’ fossi avaro in l’altra vita, 33 forse per quella cerchia dov’ io era.
query.error: **English:** 31 Your question confirms your belief 32 that I was avaricious in the other life, 33 perhaps because of that circle where I was.
query.result: 31 Dha ammres a wra’m kler dhe’th gresi 32 bos o seugh ow tos avarus yn-n an bys aral, 33 marteth rag an krug henna ow seugh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
34 Or sappi ch’avarizia fu partita 35 troppo da me, e questa dismisura 36 migliaia di lunari hanno punita.
query.error: **English:** 34 Now know that avarice was parted 35 too much from me, and this excess 36 thousands of moons have punished.
query.result: 34 Mes gowdh bos avaris o seugh rannys 35 re beu dhe’m, ha an dismisur-ma 36 mylyow a loor a wra henna koskys.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.prompt:

43 Allor m’accorsi che troppo aprir l’ali 44 potean le mani a spendere, e pente’mi 45 così di quel come de li altri mali.

query.result: 43 An henna ow komprehendyas ow treylya an eskel 44 a alla bos an dhew dhe spenjya, ha ow penedhyas 45 a-les a henna ages a’n tra mali.

query.prompt:

query.result: 46 Pyth a wra surreja gans aga blew trohys 47 rag an ignorans, neb a wra gwra 48 an penedhans rag an pekka-ma ow seugh bew ha dhe’n an diwedh!

query.result: 133 Ha dell prennen-aval, dell aval-prennen 134 a-dhiworth skoren dhe skoren, dell o, 135 rag kres, rag na allo den dhe'n nef.

query.result: 136 A-ugh an fordh o o dhe'n fordh o kledhys, 137 o'n garrek ughel o kodhas dowr kler, 138 ow lewya a-dro dhe'n delyow.
